page.title: 01COMMUNICATIONS
page.content:
Most houses in this area have telephones and television sets. Radios are common. The local radio station is County Sound broadcasting from Guildford.
Postal deliveries to the house are at least once daily and in this area are fairly reliable. Postal collections have decreased over the years. In the outlying districts such as this there is no collection between Saturday 0913 and Monday 0915. Usually post is collected morning and evening. There are 3 post boxes in squares 10-2, 12-1, 2-1 There is no post office in this area.
There is only one public telephone box in square 10.
